abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Guiyang Transport
            Project for China is to increase the access and mobility of
            Guiyang Municipality's transport users through priority
            infrastructure investments while establishing more
            sustainable mechanisms for rural road maintenance, as well
            as enhancing capacity for keeping municipal debt under
            control. The changes relate to: (i) an extension of closing
            date of the Loan by 12 months, from the original December
            31, 2012 to December 31, 2013; (ii) reallocation of Loan
            proceeds and increase of disbursement percentage; and (iii)
            addition of a legal covenant to enable the Bank to monitor,
            more efficiently, the activities related to resettlement,
            until completion.
